snippet: The markets were held back by continuing unrest in Ukraine and a dearth of corporate earnings or data-related incentives.
abstract: Stock market drifts lower for second day in row, held back by continuing unrest in Ukraine and dearth of corporate earnings or data-related incentives.
lead_paragraph: The markets were held back by continuing unrest in Ukraine and a dearth of corporate earnings or data-related incentives.

headline.main: As Profit-Taking Goes Up, Market Moves Lower
headline.print_headline: As Profit-Taking Goes Up, Market Moves Lower
